mapper.select: select ID as id, TABLE_NAME_CN as tableNameCn, TABLE_NAME as tableName, DD_ID_FIELD as ddIdField, DD_NAME_FIELD as ddNameField, DD_CODE as ddCode, IS_CONNECT_STR as isConnectStr, COL_1 as col1, COL_2 as col2, COL_3 as col3, COL_4 as col4, COL_5 as col5, ENABLED as enabled, REMOVED as removed, CREATE_USER_ID as createUserId, CREATE_USER_NAME as createUserName, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_USER_ID as updateUserId, UPDATE_USER_NAME as updateUserName, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime from streetcloud.SYS_DATADICTIONARY
mapper.insert: insert into streetcloud.SYS_DATADICTIONARY( ID, TABLE_NAME_CN, TABLE_NAME, DD_ID_FIELD, DD_NAME_FIELD, DD_CODE, IS_CONNECT_STR, COL_1, COL_2, COL_3, COL_4, COL_5, ENABLED, REMOVED, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_USER_NAME, UPDATE_TIME ) values( #{id}, #{tableNameCn}, #{tableName}, #{ddIdField}, #{ddNameField}, #{ddCode}, #{isConnectStr}, #{col1}, #{col2}, #{col3}, #{col4}, #{col5}, #{enabled}, #{removed}, #{createUserId}, #{createUserName}, #{createTime}, #{updateUserId}, #{updateUserName}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update:
update streetcloud.SYS_DATADICTIONARY
TABLE_NAME_CN = #{tableNameCn},
TABLE_NAME = #{tableName},
DD_ID_FIELD = #{ddIdField},
DD_NAME_FIELD = #{ddNameField},
DD_CODE = #{ddCode},
IS_CONNECT_STR = #{isConnectStr},
COL_1 = #{col1},
COL_2 = #{col2},
COL_3 = #{col3},
COL_4 = #{col4},
COL_5 = #{col5},
ENABLED = #{enabled},
REMOVED = #{removed},
CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId},
CREATE_USER_NAME = #{createUserName},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId},
UPDATE_USER_NAME = #{updateUserName},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime},
where id=#{id}
